Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy (Pre.details: Management of severe preeclampsia/eclampsia (32-36 weeks), anticonvulsants (Magnesium Sulphate), complications (HELLP), differential diagnosis of convulsions.

Anaemia in Pregnancy.details: Iron deficiency anaemia, diagnosis, grading severity, management (parenteral iron/blood transfusion), prevention, severe anaemia at 32-37 weeks.

Antepartum Haemorrhage (APH).details: Placenta Previa vs Abruptio Placentae, clinical differentiation, management of bleeding at 32-36 weeks, complications (DIC).

Multiple Pregnancy (Twins).details: Diagnosis, complications (maternal/fetal), management of labour, monochorionic twin complications (TTTS).

Malpresentations (Breech).details: Causes, types, management of vaginal breech delivery (assisted breech), complications, External Cephalic Version (ECV).

Heart Disease in Pregnancy.details: Rheumatic Heart Disease (Mitral Stenosis), NYHA classification, management during pregnancy and labour, failure management.

Labour Complications (Obstructed Labour.details: Causes, diagnosis, management of obstructed labour, Trial of Labour After Caesarean (TOLAC/VBAC), rupture uterus.

Diabetes in Pregnancy (GDM).details: Screening (DIPSI), diagnosis, antenatal and intrapartum management, complications (fetal/maternal).

Fibroid Uterus / AUB.details: Classification (FIGO/PALM-COEIN), clinical features (menorrhagia), differential diagnosis of mass abdomen, management (medical/surgical - myomectomy vs hysterectomy).

Carcinoma Cervix.details: Staging (FIGO), screening (Pap smear), management of Stage I/IB, prevention (HPV vaccine), risk factors.

Uterovaginal Prolapse.details: Etiology, supports of uterus, classification (POPQ/Shaw's), management (conservative/surgical - Fothergill's, Vaginal Hysterectomy).

Infertility.details: Evaluation of couple (male/female factors), tubal patency tests, ovulation induction, management of primary/secondary infertility.

Ovarian Tumours.details: Classification, differential diagnosis of mass abdomen (benign vs malignant), management of dermoid cyst/epithelial tumours, tumor markers.

Carcinoma Endometrium / Postmenopausal B.details: Causes of PMB, risk factors, staging, evaluation (biopsy/USG), management.

Fetal Monitoring & Assessment.details: Biophysical profile (BPP), Non-stress test (NST), CTG (decelerations), Partogram, First trimester USG.

Operative Obstetrics.details: Forceps delivery, Ventouse (Vacuum) delivery, Episiotomy (types/complications), Caesarean section (indications/complications).

Maternal Mortality & Social Obstetrics.details: Definition (MMR), causes (Direct/Indirect), prevention strategies, RCH programmes.

Puerperium.details: Puerperal sepsis/pyrexia causes and management, physiology of lactation, breast feeding benefits, lactational failure.

Abortion & Early Pregnancy Complications.details: Missed abortion, Recurrent pregnancy loss, Ectopic pregnancy (medical/surgical management), Vesicular mole (follow-up).

Malpositions & Malpresentations.details: Deep transverse arrest, Occipito-posterior position, Shoulder dystocia, Cord prolapse, Face presentation.

Pharmacotherapy.details: Magnesium sulphate (regimens/toxicity), Anti-D prophylaxis, Iron sucrose/parenteral iron, Prostaglandins, Oxytocics.

Newborn.details: Neonatal resuscitation, Neonatal jaundice, Birth asphyxia, Caput succedaneum vs Cephalhematoma.

Medical Disorders.details: Rh isoimmunization prevention, UTI in pregnancy (Asymptomatic bacteriuria), HIV (PPTCT), Vomiting in pregnancy (Hyperemesis).

Preterm Labour & PROM.details: Risk factors, diagnosis, management (tocolytics/steroids), PPROM complications.

Contraception.details: IUCD (complications/contraindications/PPIUCD), OCPs (benefits/side effects/contraindications), Emergency contraception, Barrier methods (Condom), Sterilization (Laparoscopic/Puerperal).

Infections.details: Vaginitis (Candidiasis, Trichomoniasis, Bacterial Vaginosis), PID (Acute/Chronic), Genital Tuberculosis, Syndromic management.

Menstrual Disorders.details: Dysmenorrhea (Congestive/Spasmodic), Puberty menorrhagia, Cryptomenorrhea, Primary/Secondary Amenorrhea causes.

Diagnostic Procedures.details: Semen analysis (WHO criteria), Tubal patency tests (HSG), Hysteroscopy, Laparoscopy (indications/complications), Pap smear, Colposcopy.

Endometriosis & Adenomyosis.details: Clinical features, diagnosis (Chocolate cyst), medical/surgical management.

Anatomy & Development.details: Supports of uterus, Lymphatic drainage of cervix, Mullerian anomalies (Imperforate hymen/Septate uterus).

Endocrinology.details: PCOS (diagnosis/management), Turner's syndrome, Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT), Hyperprolactinemia.

Miscellaneous.details: Stress urinary incontinence, Vesico-vaginal fistula (VVF), Pruritus vulvae, Bartholin cyst, Decubitus ulcer.
